name: Tykki Defense (One Button Jam Demo)
description:
Controls:

Tap [SPACE] to change the cannon angle

Hold and release [SPACE] to fire the cannon - holding longer = more power

Unfortunately this game is unfinished, because we lost contact to our programmer in the last couple hours before the deadline.

The valiant Spencer heard our cry for help and rushed to our rescue, but alas...

We will definitely keep working on this game and hope you will be with us by the time we finish it.

We might always need programmers to help flesh it out, so if you're interested, just shoot me a mail at admin[at]tykkigames.com.

Again, HUGE THANKS to Spencer, who helped us out tremendously on short notice.

Credits:

Artwork: nessie

Soundtrack: Lewis Thompson

Sound Design: tigris

Programming: StuffBySpencer

Team Leader / Concept: Butterbart
